content.rendered:
100% Approved by Customers
Google
Yelp
Google

“Came in with some brake issues and was an extremely great experience. John was super patient and explained things in detail for a car noob like me. Great work, fairly priced, I will be returning as a customer.”

Matt Reshke
 5/5

“Professionalism, Punctuality, Quality, Value. Complete Automotive is my go-to car service vendor. They’re professional, very good at what they do, and reasonably priced. We have 2 old-ish cars, and Complete Automotive always gives them good care.”

Jonathan Taylor
 5/5

“Love this place. People are very friendly and transparent with what’s going on. They always get the work done as fast as they can and as far as I can tell the work has always been top notch!”

Jennifer Sheppard
 5/5

“We took our 4 fleet sprinters here for service this week. John had everything setup before we got there, and they did a great job. good value and great communication. I highly recommend this shop to anyone that needs service on their Sprinters (or other vehicles).”

Robert Carter
 5/5

“This place is wonderful. Bob and John A are extremely knowledgeable and helpful. It took me weeks to find a service place that could do an evap system smoke test. They are my new service station.”

Valerie Collins
 5/5

“Have used this service for years. Their mechanics are top notch. Their pricing has always been fair. I recommend them to close friends and relatives.”

Jerome Vozoff
 5/5

“Really great drive through service. They’re extremely transparent, good communicators, and work quickly and efficiently. Coming back for all future oil changes!”

Lora Steele
 5/5

“I’ve had great experiences with the whole crew here; they’re kind, knowledgeable and efficient. I’ve really appreciated the help and hospitality! Highly recommend others use their services.”

Abigail Boudreaux
 5/5

“Dealing with Mike, my service advisor was great. They did their best to get my BMW back on the road again. They prioritized the repairs and fixed what they could while working within my repair budget.”

Ron Riley
 5/5
Yelp

“Very attentive and friendly service.  Bob was extremely helpful in setting up my appointment and giving me an objective explanation of a Sprinter I was looking to buy.  Highly recommend and will be taking my new (old) van here for scheduled maintenance!”

Jaron H.
 5/5

“Complete auto is our go to for all our auto repair needs. Even when they are busy they always find a way to take care of us. Most of the time they are done before we expected. Thanks to all the people at complete auto.”

David D.
 5/5

“John A is the best.   He will bend over backwards to make you happy.  I stopped in for a lube and oil job and he found all these problems I didn’t know existed.   He and his team worked hand over fist to fix all my issues and I left completely satisfied.”

Previn W.
 5/5

“I’ve had my Benz worked on a couple times here, and it’s as easy as it gets. These guys are the best. Top notch service. The work is done timely and there aren’t any surprises. Don’t waste your time and money at the dealership.”

Lisa S.
 5/5

“I’ve been going to these guys for a while now since they are close to me. They are friendly and honest. I know nothing about cars but they’ll take the time to explain things to me in a non condescending way. I feel like my business is appreciated and I am respected as a customer.”

Melissa D.
 5/5

“The service and auto expertise here is unparalleled. I look for honesty and service at a car shop and this place delivers consistently. My 14 yr old Lexus had an issue caught here and saved me thousands of dollars in future repair.”

George H.
 5/5

“The guys at CAS are top notch. Brought in my car last week with weird noises coming from the engine and they were able to diagnose the problem and performed the repair quickly. Would definitely use these guys again for all my auto needs.”

Ray A.
 5/5

“These gentlemen are honest, quick, and reliable.
I arrived, expecting to see a small smog check shop, and instead I was welcomed to a large and impressive building. They do it all here!!! I see absolutely no reason to go anywhere else!”

Levi P.
 5/5

“Off a family recommendation I’ve been going here since I had my first car as a teen. Two cars and almost a decade later, I can say every time I’ve brought a vehicle in for service the whole staff has never failed to be 100% transparent, accommodating, and friendly. Highest recommendation!”

Rhys P.
 5/5
